version_description: no more cut off texts - iOS7 bugs fixed

- DailyArt is all ready for iOS8 and new, big resolutions :]
- More updates will arrive soon. Be ready!
- If you have any suggestions how to improve the app, please drop us a line: zuzanna@getdailyart.com
- minor bugs are now fixed!

- facebook sharing option fixed!
- small changes in navigation - it is much more logical now
- other small improvements (but the huge update is coming soon!)

- Everything is new.
- I mean it :) We have new design, new database, new features. Hope you will like it!
- fixes of couple of minor bugs, including these in registration :)

- little bug with Twitter fixed
- Apple Watch fixes

- bux fixes in the database and apple watch
- you can look up for words and copy the text now
- download the largest image possible to your camera roll
- new piece arrives at midnight of your timezone
- we have fixed couple of bugs, nothing serious but it's better to update the app! :)
- Rating in App Store fixed
- Bug fixes :)
- bug with the in-app purchase fixed!

- now we are iPhone X friendly :)
- 3D Touch and push notifications with images
- three sizes of fonts!
- the database should run faster
- universal links so you could access the app from various other applications
- some bug fixes, as always

We have couple of fixes for you :)
- fixed problem with timezones and displaying the "today" painting
- fixed problem with push notifications
- fixed problem with using DailyArt on more than two devices :)
We love you all for your patience! <3

Sorry for having so many updates lately but we want DailyArt to be constantly better and better! :)
We have fixed some navigation inconvenience. The change is mind blowing :D

We have updated the app so to assure you that we are CONSTANTLY working on it. Please support our work by buying an in-app purchase:) But we have also:
- fixed some bugs ;)
- added login via Google
Cheers!

- a new icon - I hope you will get used to it. We needed something fresh and catchy!
- new about screen list - with all the contributors and translators :)
- some bug fixing for new iOS.
Thank you for being with us! :)

- some bug fixing for new iOS.
- a new icon - I hope you will get used to it. We needed something fresh and catchy!
- new about screen list - with all the contributors and translators :)
Thank you for being with us! :)

Friends, today is our big day - DailyArt is now available in: Italian, French, Portuguese, Spanish and Turkish. We are still translating some archival pieces, bios and information about museum collections but the ongoing DailyArts are fully translated :) Enjoy!

We have fixed the bug with the language screen (the one that showed up with every opening)
Happy New Year 2019!
Zuzanna & DailyArt Team
- some bug fixes and sorry, we had to implement ads :( We need to earn funds to launch new language versions :( But everyone who is PRO won't see them, don't worry!

This time we introduce a Chinese language version of the app :)))
We have also fixed some bugs.
See you! :)
Zuzanna

Dear users,
from today on, DailyArt is available also in Chinese Traditional. We have also fixed some bugs (Instagram), added push notifications at 12:00, a widget (yeey!), and the info about our translators and proofreaders. Enjoy!

What's new?
- NEW LANGUAGES! Hindi, Arabic and Japanese :) こんにちは！हैलो! مرحبا!
- DARK MODE
- Instagram Stories share
- some bug fixes
:))))
Enjoy!
We introduce new feature - Get Lucky. With this button you can get a random masterpiece from our archive! Enjoy! :)
- bug fixes :) Happy New Year!

Hello the Netherlands! DailyArt is now available in Dutch :)
And we are ready for iOS 14 with the new widget :)
bug fixes :)

We are now available in Greek! :)
bug fixes :)
bug fixes :)
